modName: A Huge Chest For High Hrothgar
summary: Well, this is my first mod. I am learning the CK, wanted to do something simple, so I placed a ridiculously oversized chest in High Hrothgar.
descriptionHtml:
Does this really need a description? It adds a massive chest to High Hrothgar.

FAQs:

Q: I can't find the chest, why not?
A: I recommend you get your vision checked

Q: Why did you make such a random, ridiculous and pointless mod?
A: Because it's my first mod, first thing actually done in CK, wanted to add it to Nexus to say that I have in fact uploaded a mod to the Nexus.

Q: Will this mod be updated?
A: If you can honestly think of something in this mod that needs to be updated, I would very much like to hear about it.

Q: Why the heck is the chest so big?
A: If you're a male, my response is: Why not?
If you're a female, my response is: Why is your chest so small? I AM SORRY I COULD NOT RESIST MAKING THAT JOKE. EMPHASIS SHOULD BE PLACED ON THE WORD JOKE, BECAUSE I WAS JUST KIDDING. DO NOT GET MAD, JUST LAUGH OR DON'T LAUGH AND MOVE ON.

Thank you. Download and endorse if you really want to.
author: PIZZAGUY520
